item.description: If everyone brings their favorite bottle of wine depending on how many people are coming it would be good. Bring some infromation about your wine and were you bought it. There are usually 4 -5 full glasses of wine per bottle. That would be 8 to 10 tasting glasses. Depending on how many people are coming I may ask people to pair up to bring two of the same wine. I've not done a home wine tasting before so any suggestions would be helpful. It would be good to have three white and three red depending on the amount of people.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be preparing cheese and crackers and fruit.
item.why: Because its the Memorial day week end.

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: Memorial Day Wine Tasting
